text: Every corny thing that's said about living with nature - being in harmony with the earth, feeling the cycle of the seasons - happens to be true.
author: Susan Orlean

text: Nature's music is never over her silences are pauses, not conclusions.
author: Mary Webb

text: There are no lines in nature, only areas of colour, one against another.
author: Edouard Manet

text: The beautiful spring came and when Nature resumes her loveliness, the human soul is apt to revive also.
author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

text: The stars, that nature hung in heaven, and filled their lamps with everlasting oil, give due light to the misled and lonely traveller.
author: John Milton
